level.heading: NOTIFICATION OF CRIMINAL CONVICTION OR CHANGE IN LICENSEE INFORMATION (ยง1-514)

level.text: 514.1 An owner of a taxicab company, association, or fleet; a member of a partnership that owns a taxicab company, association, or fleet; or an officer or shareholder holding more than five percent (5%) of the shares of a corporation or other entity that owns a taxicab company, association, or fleet, shall:
Notify the Commission in writing of his or her conviction for a crime no later than fifteen (15) days after the conviction; and
Deliver to the Commission a certified copy of the certificate of disposition issued by the clerk of the court no later than fifteen (15) days after the conviction.

514.2 In accordance with ยง 507.6, an owner of a taxicab company, association, or fleet shall notify the Commission of a material change in the information contained on the most recent license or renewal application of the taxicab company, association, or fleet, no later than five (5) business days after such change.

An owner, employee, agent, or representative of a taxicab company, association, or fleet or a person acting on his or her behalf, shall notify the Commission in writing of the arrest of a taxicab operator who is employed by or in affiliation or association with the taxicab company, association, or fleet, no later than fifteen (15) days after knowledge of the arrest.
